description:
Find your favourite products from perfume, make-up and skincare to lifestyle. Shop popular cosmetics brands such as Benefit, Urban Decay and Kylie Cosmetics and scroll through our online perfumery to find high-quality fragrances from Chanel to Dior. You'll also find trendy skincare brands such as The Ordinary and Rituals - for a radiant complexion and your wellness break. Pamper your hair with exclusive care highlights from KÉRASTASE and Redken. Fall in love with new products and trends such as K-beauty, clean beauty and organic cosmetics every day with the Douglas app - the smallest make-up bag in the world is waiting for you!

Your exclusive benefits:

- DOUGLAS BEAUTY CARD: Collect valuable Douglas Beauty Points with every purchase in the app or in our shops.

- DOUGLAS BEAUTY MIRROR: Test make-up looks with a mirror of a special kind! Discover lipsticks, foundations, mascaras & co. that set you off perfectly. Our augmented reality tool acts like a filter over your face and shows you currently highlighted products and different styles. Wedding look, nude make-up or French chic? You decide!

- PURCHASE FUNCTION: Reorder your beauty and perfume favourites with just a few clicks. Have all your empties been replenished already? Then pause the repurchase or remove the product from the repurchase list. Turn the Douglas app into your personalised shopping list!

- LIVE SHOPPING EVENTS: Discover highlighted products and hot trends in our regular live streams. You can use the comment function to ask our experts your beauty questions.

- UP TO DATE ON ALL DEVICES: Add your new product faves to your wishlist or directly to the shopping cart - we automatically synchronise your selection on all devices you're logged in to.

- FAST ACCOUNT OVERVIEW: Look at your current orders, personal data and delivery addresses at a glance.

- FIND YOUR FAVOURITE STORE: Use our store finder to discover the Douglas stores near you.

- NEWS AND OFFERS AT A GLANCE: Activate the push notifications and be the first to know about the latest Douglas discounts.

- BEAUTY TIPS & TRENDS: Get inspired by our online magazine and discover the hottest beauty trends!

Discover the free Sinsay app - your favorite place to shop online!

Discover the latest trends and fashion inspirations without leaving your home.

Fashion for everyone! We offer a wide selection of clothes and accessories - women's, men's, children's and baby's fashion. You will find everything you need here - from elegant dresses, through comfortable jeans, T-shirts, to stylish accessories and footwear. Also check out our range of cosmetics that perfectly fit into current trends.

A home full of style! At Sinsay you can buy home decorations and other accessories that will change any interior. Create your dream space and don't overpay.

Inspirations and trends! Keep up to date with the latest trends and draw inspiration from our styles. Perfect fashion for everyone is right here!

Attractive promotions! Check the app every day and take advantage of special discount campaigns! Scratch cards, Product of the Day, challenges and many promotions that will make you pay less.

Sinsay Club loyalty program! Join and enjoy unique benefits! For every purchase you collect points that you can exchange for coupons worth up to -XX EUR. Become our regular customer and take advantage of attractive offers only for Club members.
 	
Sinsay Club loyalty program! Join and enjoy unique benefits! For every purchase you collect points that you can exchange for coupons worth up to -XX EUR. Become our regular customer and take advantage of attractive offers only for Club members.

Easy, fast and... attractively priced! The intuitive application will allow you to go through the shopping process in a few simple steps, and attractive prices and a wide selection of clothes give you the opportunity to buy many styles for every occasion.

Functionality! Track the status of your order, add products to Favorites, use returns without a receipt, receive notifications about new products and attractive promotions. All this in one place!

Download the Sinsay application today and join the world of fashion, inspiration and unique opportunities!

Notino: The whole beauty world in your pocket, anywhere, anytime!

Notino is the largest European online store selling cosmetics and perfumes. We have almost everything in stock from more than 1,500 global brands. Plus offers tailored to suit your tastes, authentic reviews and lots of smart tools to help you choose the right foundation, lipstick or perfume.

Fall in love with Notino today

⁕  App-only offers
Direct access to the best prices, special offers created just for you and available only in the app. Be the first to know about all of our discounts and offers!

⁕ Wishlist
Keep all your beauty favourites in one place, create a shopping list or use Wishlist to hunt for a better deal!

⁕ Reviews
Are you afraid to purchase new beauty products without any personal experience? We've got loads of verified reviews from our customers at Notino to help you with your decision.

⁕ Virtual Try On
Try our Virtual Try On, which shows you how a given shade of lipstick, foundation or eyeshadow will look on you thanks to the selfie mode on your camera. It’s fun ;-)

⁕ Fast, simple and safe shopping
Search, choose, then pay and look forward to receiving your package, which is usually sent the same day!

And that’s not all… Notino will be your endless source of inspiration thanks to our professional blog or our regular live streams ;-)

See you in the Notino app!

Collect, shop, save, and win!

The Müller App offers many benefits, such as a digital customer card, coupons, sweepstakes, and more. Take advantage of these benefits!

Here is how it works:
1. Download the free Müller App.
2. Register for the Müller customer card using your email address and password.
3. To take advantage of the many benefits of the app, you need to provide some personal information. Then, you decide which information you want to provide and can choose to activate our notifications.

The benefits and features of the Müller App:

Digital customer card
We reward your loyalty! You collect Müller Blossoms on your customer card by making purchases and referrals. You can redeem these for future purchases and save money. In addition, receive a welcome bonus for your first purchase by simply scanning the app at the cash register.
The app is always at your fingertips and is a digital customer card on your mobile device. Check the balance of Blossoms on your customer card at any time and get an overview of your past purchases in your “Blossom account”.


Coupons & Sweepstakes
In the app, you can see an overview of current coupons from our drugstore and other departments.
Activate the coupons, scan your customer card at the cash register, and save money.
Additionally, you benefit from exclusive sweepstakes.

Other features
Store finder: In our store finder, you can find your nearest Müller store, opening hours, and other information about Müller stores.


Brochures & Magazines: In the brochure overview, you can find and browse the current Müller brochures and our regular drugstore offers. You can also find our customer magazines and get inspired!

Digital receipt: After your purchase, you receive your receipt in the app. This ensures sustainability and is also practical since you won’t lose it.

Automatic Wi-Fi login:
You have the option to agree to use the customer Wi-Fi conveniently from home. 
Once you agree, your device will automatically connect to the Müller free Wi-Fi network every time you visit our shops.

Cross-border use: Use the Müller App in several countries – Germany, Austria, Switzerland, Slovenia, Spain, Croatia and Hungary. You now have the option to change the country in the app. After changing the country, the app content will be available in the corresponding local language.


Your opinion matters! We appreciate your feedback so we can improve our Müller App. 

Use the contact form within the app or write to our app customer service.
Germany: service@app.de.mueller.eu
Austria: service@app.at.mueller.eu
Switzerland: service@app.ch.mueller.eu
Slovenia: aplikacija@app.si.mueller.eu
Spain: service@app.es.mueller.eu
Croatia: aplikacija@app.hr.mueller.eu
Hungary: kapcsolat@app.hu.mueller.eu

The idea is simple: you sell your pre-loved stuff to other members who’ll love it again. They get the thrill of unboxing a great find, you get more space at home. It's look-good, do-good, feel-good, for everyone. 

Selling is easy and free
Snap photos of your item, describe it, and set your price. You keep 100% of what you earn.  
• Cash in on your pre-loved clothes, homeware and appliances, electronics, collectables, kids’ toys, and more. 
• Watch your earnings grow. Send your money straight to your bank account. 
• Buyers cover shipping costs. You get prepaid labels that make things simple. 

Shop new-again finds 				
Feel proud of your second-hand discoveries, from designer gems to great-value tech. 
• Fast finds, long-lasting love. There’s a Vinted category for almost everything, use filters to speed up shopping. 
• We’ve got your back. When you buy on Vinted, we cover you with Buyer Protection. For a small fee, you’ll get a refund if your item is lost, damaged in delivery, or significantly not as described. 
• Choose a shipping carrier and have your order sent to your home or a convenient pick-up point.  

Get added confidence
There are 2 verification services on Vinted to give you peace of mind when trading more expensive pieces. 
Item Verification for designer fashion
Have selected items checked for authenticity by our team of experts. 
Electronics Verification 
For certain tech items, get the functionality, condition, and authenticity verified. 
You’ll only receive items that pass the check, or get a refund. Opt to buy verification during checkout. 

There’s a diverse community of second-hand enthusiasts waiting to meet you. Chat with your fellow members, get updates, and manage your orders all in one place. 

Come join us
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@vinted 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/vinted
Find out more in our Help Centre: https://www.vinted.co.uk/help

The Zalando app is your new go-to for quality fashion and lifestyle brands (over 6,000!), outfit and beauty inspiration at your fingertips, and a shopping experience that’s all smooth and no stress.

IT'S GIVING INSPIRATION
• Follow your favourite creators for outfit and styling inspo
• Follow brands you like to see more from them first, including new releases and exclusive collections
• Curate and follow boards of the outfits, videos, and products that inspire you, and start inspiring others
• Explore what’s trending across Europe with Trend Spotter and see what everyone’s wearing in Berlin, Paris, and Milan right now
• Tune into our Live videos to get tips from the experts, product how-tos, and inspo you can add directly to your bag
• Tap into Stories to get your style and culture guide with features like “What do I wear?” plus the latest on major brand collabs
• Save your faves to your wishlist and never miss a size update or price drop

IT'S GIVING CHOICE
• Browse over 11,000 items from a wide range of brands, including all-time fashion favourites
• Dive into our different assortments: clothing, shoes, accessories, sports, beauty and skincare, preloved gems, and kidswear
• Get updates on the things you care about - from news and trends to sales and discount codes
• Hear about new collections and product launches from the brands you love
• Never miss a price drop or restock by opting in to notifications on items in your wishlist
• Give preloved clothing a new life when you shop our extensive selection of pre-owned (but just like new!) clothing, accessories, and boots
Pick your preferred way to pay and enjoy delivery directly to your own doorstep

IT'S GIVING PERSONAL
• Benefit from spot-on recommendations that show you the items you’ll love, without you needing to go looking for them
• Rate how the fashion you’ve ordered fits and get personalised sizing advice as you shop
• Get measured with our measurements tool to find what fits, fast
• Try on outfits in our virtual fitting room to see how they’ll fit before ordering
• Get instant style and outfit advice from the Zalando Assistant, a tailor-made AI-powered fashion assistant to help you on your shopping journey

So, ready to explore the app?
Shop the brands you love, unlock exclusive deals, and get inspiration and recommendations that feel like they were made just for you.

You can choose from over 80 thousand models from 450 of the most popular world brands at competitive pricing.
You want to be up to date with the latest trends and the best deals? l
In the efootwear.eu app you will find fashion inspirations and you will be the first to know about our new products and best offers!  There are hundreds of top brands and the latest trends from global manufacturers waiting for you!

You may know us under the brand names: eobuwie.pl,  obuvki.bg, ecipele.hr, eobuv.cz, chaussures.fr, epapoutsia.gr, zapatos.es, eavalynė.lt, eschuhe.de, epantofi.ro, eskor.se, eobuv.sk, eobutev.si, ecipo.hu, escarpe.it, eapavi.lv

Do you have any questions? 
At this address: https://eobuwie.com.pl/kontakt you will find all the ways to contact our company. 

Personal data
In order to use the application, we will ask you to provide basic personal information. But don't worry, with us they are completely safe! You can access your data at any time and have the right to correct or delete it. The administrator of your personal data is MODIVO.COM S.A (Nowy Kisielin - Naukowa 15, 66-002 Zielona Góra Street; e-mail: info@modivo.com, telephone: 00 4868 422 84 04). You can also contact our data protection officer: iod@eobuwie.com.pl.

developer: AUCHAN MAGYARORSZAG Kereskedelmi es Szolgaltato Korlatolt Felelossegu Tarsasag
description:
Az új Auchan alkalmazással mindig a zsebedben lehet a Bizalomkártyád, gyűjtsd a pontokat és spórolj egyedi ajánlatainkkal! Okos bevásárlólistánkkal kényelmesebbé és tudatosabbá teheted a vásárlásodat, ráadásul biztos, hogy minden a kosaradba kerül! Áruházi térképünk segítségével könnyebb és gyorsabb lehet a bevásárlásod, így az ajánlatainkkal kombinálva nem csak pénzt, de időt is spórolsz!
 
Miért jó az Auchan Bizalomkártya?
-     Bizalomkártyáddal vásárlásaid után Bizalompontokat tudsz gyűjteni. Minden elköltött 1.000 Ft után 5 pontot írunk jóvá a Bizalomkártyádra. A pontokat az Auchan áruházakban, az online vásárlásnál, illetve a benzinkúti tankolások után tudod gyűjteni.
-     Extra ajánlatok a tudatos kártyahasználóknak - Minden héten akár 30%-os termék-kedvezmények!
-     Gyors regisztráció csak néhány adat megadásával
 
Tervezd meg vásárlásodat!
-     Okos bevásárlólistánkkal előre megtervezheted a vásárlásodat
-     Bevásárlólistád pároddal, barátaiddal vagy családoddal is megoszthatod
-     A bevásárlólistád mellett az áruházi térképet is ellenőrizheted, hogy ne tévedj el többet
 
Kihagyhatatlan kedvezmények minden héten!
-     Nézd meg az összes kedvezményünket egy helyen
-     Bizalomkártyásként jobbnál-jobb egyedi ajánlatokat érhetsz el

 
Elég, ha a telefonod nálad van!
-    A telefonoddal egy ideje már fizetni is tudsz, de most már a bizalomkártyát is megtalálod digitális formában
-    Az okos bevásárlólistánkkal nem kell papírfecniket bogarásznod
-    Áruháztérképünk segítségével minden terméket hamar megtalálsz
-    Bizalomkártyád egyszerűen hozzáadhatod telefonod Tárca alkalmazásához

developer: Lidl Digital International GmbH & Co. KG
description:
LIDL PLUS: Find Food Deals, Grocery Coupons and Shopping Rewards on the Products You Love! The service is aimed at customers who'd like to receive personalised information from Lidl Stiftung about Lidl Plus promotions, as well as offers, products and services from Lidl Companies and selected partners. We personalise this information based on your purchase and usage behaviour of the products and services of the Lidl Companies.

Incredible grocery discounts every time you shop with Lidl! ‘Straight in my basket!’ 

Download, register and save even more. Lidl Plus is our new rewards app, designed to give you discounts on the products you love. 

The service is aimed at customers who'd like to receive personalised information from Lidl Stiftung about Lidl Plus promotions, as well as offers, products and services from Lidl Companies and selected partners. We personalise this information based on your purchase and usage behaviour of the products and services of the Lidl Companies.

Available in Republic of Ireland, Northern Ireland, Great Britain and Malta. 

We’ll send you Lidl coupons based on the products that you love. Simply activate your coupons and scan in store to make incredible savings on your Lidl shopping. 

Every time you shop, you will also get the chance to win amazing prizes*. So what’s not to like? Check out the best things about the Lidl Plus loyalty app and how to use it.

HOW TO GET LIDL PLUS LOYALTY REWARDS:

 - Activate your coupons in the app and scan your digital Lidl Plus Card at the till to redeem and save money on your shop.
 - Scan your digital Lidl Plus Card at the till for the chance to win great prizes* on each store visit!
 -  Never lose a receipt again. You’ll get a purchase summary and a digital copy of your receipt with Lidl Plus.
 -  Never miss another offer. Browse through a digital version of our weekly leaflet in the app.

Plus many more exciting features!

We made this app to reward you for shopping at Lidl and to help you find deals on your favourite foods, drinks and household items. 

From amazing food coupons to saving money on your next shop – Lidl Plus is the app to download if you want to get the best food deals and shopping discounts. We’re always looking to help you enjoy quality products at great prices, so download our free loyalty app and register today and find food deals, shopping rewards and grocery coupons on the products you love.

*This feature is not available in all countries.

When joining the Lidl Plus program, you can allow tracking technology, which helps us to understand how you interact with the app. This includes what pages you visit, what coupons you view, and how long you spend on each page. This tracking allows Lidl Plus to improve the app and provide you with tailored communication, discounts and to participate in relevant surveys.

Data Protection Policy:

Clubcard Tesco Hungary

Do you like shopping at Tesco stores? Clubcard helps you save. Join now!


With all purchases, you earn points (1 for every 100 HUF) that are credited to your Clubcard account. Once you have earned at least 400 points, you can transfer it to a voucher, which you can redeem the next time you shop. You can track changes to your points in your Clubcard account.


Make your shopping more convenient with the Tesco Clubcard app.
- Quickly and conveniently access your coupons and vouchers, which you can redeem right from your mobile phone.
- Tesco store locator, opening hours of the stores are available in the app
 - just like leaflet and magazines 


Make it more rewarding with the Tesco Clubcard app.


With Clubcard Tesco app you’ll have at your disposal member’s promo events, competitions and many other surprises at any time and all in one place.


When you go shopping, you can even leave your Clubcard at home: at checking out, just scan your card code directly from your mobile!



The app is FREE to download for smartphones with the following operating systems:
• iOS 14.0 and newer

Get the free Takko Friends app now and benefit from exclusive advantages!
You can expect:

# special surprises, promotions & discounts 
# shopping points for individual coupons (€1 purchase value = 100 points)

# a digital customer card & receipts 
# can only be used in Germany, Austria & the Netherlands 
# and much more ...
 
What are you waiting for? Becoming a Takko Friend is worth it!
 
Shop, earn points, save
It's that simple! Download the Takko Friends App for free, sign up, collect shopping points and exchange them for discount coupons  
 
Collect points
Nothing could be easier! Show your digital customer card when paying and collect 100 shopping points for every €1 spent. 
 
Redeem discount coupons
Every point counts! Simply activate your favourite coupon in the app with your collected points and show your digital customer card when paying.  
 
Your welcome voucher
We won't keep you waiting long! After your registration, you will receive your first discount* from us.
 
Your birthday surprise
Celebrate every year with a little gift from us!
 
And the Takko Friends app has even more to offer ... 
 
Free deliveries
Shop extensively and try on clothes comfortably at home? From an online order value of €49,99, we will deliver your favourite styles directly to your home free of charge. 
 
Even more benefits?
Of course, because Takko Friends save more! Look forward to further exclusive offers & numerous benefits. 
 
Unlimited shopping sun
Takko Friends shop smarter! With the digital receipt, you always have an eye on your expenses, both online and offline.
 
Never miss anything again!
What are the latest trends? Where can you find the best deal? With the news section in your app, you're always up-to-date. 
 
Always Close to You
How far is the nearest store from you? The store finder will show you!
 
*Valid for a purchase value of €20 or more. After complete registration, you will receive a one-time discount, which you can redeem both in the Takko Fashion online shop at takko.com and in Takko Fashion stores. The discount cannot be combined with other promotions or reductions. Not valid for gift cards. Cash payout is also not possible.

Black Friday starts here — score huge deals on the AliExpress app right now. AliExpress brings millions of items across fashion, electronics, home, beauty and more, all in one easy app so you can grab Black Friday discounts, flash sales and app-only coupons.

Find top brands, unique finds and everyday essentials at great prices. Read honest buyer reviews, compare sellers, and use smart search and filters to find exactly what you want. With AliExpress you get personalized recommendations, saved wishlists, price-drop alerts and curated collections tailored to your tastes.

We make shopping safe and simple. AliExpress protects your purchase with secure payments, buyer protection and easy returns. Track orders in real time, get delivery updates, and choose fast shipping options when you need items quickly. Chat with sellers or our support team right from the app.

Don’t miss limited-time Black Friday deals, exclusive app offers and flash events — AliExpress updates promotions constantly so you can save more. Whether you’re hunting for gifts, seasonal styles, or must-have gadgets, AliExpress puts endless choice and value in your pocket.

Download the AliExpress app today, join millions of shoppers, and enjoy worry-free shopping during Black Friday and all year round. Great finds and huge savings are just a tap away on AliExpress.

The My dm app has many attractive advantages and features!

Shopping with your smart handheld device? The My dm app has many attractive advantages, useful features and exciting services, and allows you to conveniently shop for your favourite products.

Log in using your existing My dm account. The app will then be tailored to your personal needs.

Download the app and get started
1. Download the My dm app to your smartphone
2. Log in with your My dm account credentials or register for a new customer account.

The best functions at a glance

Get an overview of the product range
Our search function, all the product categories and our scan function give you a quick and easy overview of the product range. Simply click through our assortment, search for specific brands or scan products, view products you’ve purchased previously, add them to your watch list, share your watch list with friends or shop directly.

Find your local store
You can search for stores near you with direct access to the store finder. This gives you quick and easy access to service information. You can save your preferred store in the app and thus display the available stock on the product pages in addition to the online availability.

Your opinion is what matters
We want to constantly improve our app. That’s why we welcome your feedback. Simply use our feedback section to let us know what you think. Please note that you will not receive confirmation when you send feedback. If you have any further questions or problems with the app, please refer to ‘Help & FAQs’ or use our contact form.

Shop thousands of high-quality sportswear, workout clothes, and cutting-edge sports equipment for kids and adults at unbeatable prices, all from the palm of your hand. Our collection caters to everyone, whether you consider yourself to besemi-pro, a casual participant, or a complete beginner. Discover world-renowned brands such as Adidas, Nike, ASICS, Timberland, Puma, and more.

Download the Decathlon Shopping App now for exclusive offers, browse our vast product range, and enjoy a smooth, secure checkout. You can also earn an extra 2000 membership points worth £3 on your next purchase on our App as a Decathlon member. With Decathlon, you get tailored push notifications, ensuring you only hear about products and promotions you care about. The app needs the following access permissions when it is running on your device:

-	Optional permission(s):

o	Notification: it will allow us to send push notifications to your device.

o	Camera: the camera function is required when you need to capture photos and videos and upload them to the app.

o	Photo and video: it will enable you to upload photos and videos from your device to the app.

o	Location: where the relevant service is available, it enables location based services on your device. 
(This is not used in Korea.)

o	Calendar: it enables you to sync the SHEIN LIVE events to your device calendar. 

o	Microphone: when you try to capture videos using Camera function, the app will also need the microphone access permission to capture the voice. 

※ Even if you do not grant optional access permissions, you can still use SHEIN service, except for the functions related to those permissions.

The fall season for shopping is here! With Allegro, you can catch the best deals and prepare for any weather. Discover thousands of products and enjoy convenient shopping, wherever you are. Get your wardrobe ready for cooler days, find ideal items for home and garden, and equip yourself with the latest electronics.

On Allegro, you will find everything you need:
Clothes for fall: Warm sweaters, stylish coats, comfortable ankle boots
Electronics: New smartphones, laptops, TV sets, drones, gaming equipment, and smartwatches
Home and Garden: Style your home for fall, prepare your garden for winter, find furniture, lighting, and decorations
Hobby: Books for long evenings, board games, sports accessories, and art supplies.
Beauty: Cosmetics for skin care and make-up, perfume, hair accessories.

Shopping in the palm of your hand:
- Easy shopping, fast payments: Buy conveniently, pay with Apple Pay, BLIK, card, or a different method of your choice
- Comfort at any time: Do you like browsing offers in the evening? Switch to dark mode and shop comfortably without straining your eyes
- Tried-and-tested products, trusted sellers: See reviews from other buyers to make sure that you choose what is best. You can easily add your own review, too!
- The list fo your Favorites: Add products to favorites to revisit them later, and share interesting offers with your friends
- Delivery tracking: With widgets, you can quickly see the status of your shipment
- Quick search: Do you search with images? Or perhaps you scan barcodes? With Image Search and Price Scanner, you will find products immediately
- Virtual wallet: Store loyalty cards from your favorite places
- Air quality: Check the air quality in your area thanks to sensors mounted on Allegro One Box machines
- Millions of products, plenty of inspiration: Choose among millions of products from different categories

Discover new functions in the Allegro app appreciated by millions of users that launched on the market more than 10 years ago.

Would you like to have free deliveries and returns?
In the app, you can also use Allegro Smart! and save on deliveries. Just pay once and enjoy free deliveries for an entire year or month.

Allegro Smart! offers great advantages:
- unlimited free deliveries with purchases over 45 PLN to parcel lockers and pick-up points and over 65 PLN by courier - free returns of shipments via parcel lockers and pick-up points,
- access to Smart! Deals — products at lower prices only for Allegro Smart! members,
- priority processing of Allegro Buyer Protection requests

All offers available with Smart! delivery have a special Smart! badge. You can find the details in the service Terms & Conditions.

Allegro App is:

- the greatest selection — over 250 million offers from various categories, like Kids (e.g., Toys, Educational Games, Clothing, Shoes, Strollers, School Supplies — Calculators, Notepads, Study Aids), Games, Home and Garden (e.g., Tools, Lighting, Smart Home, Garden Furniture), Electronics (e.g., Photography, Smartphones and Cell Phones, Smartwatches, Tablets, Computers, Audio, Video and Household Appliances, Consoles and Gaming Machines), Automotive (including Cars, Car Care Products, Tires and Rims, Garage Tools and Equipment), Health (including Blood Pressure Monitors and Accessories, Thermometers, Alternative Medicine, Medicine Cabinet Essentials, Humidifiers, Air Purifiers), Supermarket (e.g., Groceries, Healthy Foods), Fashion (including Clothing, Shoes, Accessories, Jewelry and Watches), Culture and Entertainment (e.g., Movies, Musical Instruments, Coupons and Top-Ups, Music, Games), Sports and Travel (e.g., Bicycles and Accessories, Running Clothes and "Running Shoes, Gym Accessories), as well as concert tickets and many more

developer: Hangzhou Alibaba International Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
What is Alibaba.com?
Alibaba.com is one of the world’s leading B2B ecommerce marketplaces. Our app allows you to source products from global suppliers, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Purchase with confidence
Our Trade Assurance service protects your orders and payments on the platform, letting you purchase securely and conveniently with extended support.

Customizable products
Meet suppliers with years of customization and order fulfillment experience for sellers on Amazon, eBay, Wish, Etsy, Mercari, Lazada, and more.

Easy sourcing
Discover millions of ready-to-ship products in every industry category. Tell suppliers what you need and get quotes quickly with Request for Quotation services.

Fast shipping
Alibaba.com partners with major freight forwarders to provide land, sea, and air shipping solutions with on-time delivery services, end-to-end tracking, and competitive prices.

Livestreams and factory tours
Interact with manufacturers in real-time via product demos and tours of manufacturing facilities, providing insight and oversight on how your products are made.

Popular categories and trade shows
Source a wide range of popular items – from trending consumer goods to raw materials – and join our annual trade shows for niche product highlights and discounts.

Quality control
Choose Alibaba.com Production Monitoring and Inspection Services to reduce production delay and quality risks.

Discounts and promotions
Unlock new discounts and promotions from featured manufacturers and suppliers.

Stay updated
Use the Alibaba.com app to stay up to date on new products and promotions from your favorite suppliers.

Language and currency support
Alibaba.com supports 16 languages and 140 local currencies. Use our real-time translator to communicate with sellers in your mother tongue.

Swimwear and legwear for the whole family: shop the latest trends for women, men, and kids directly from your smartphone, whenever and wherever you want. Be the first one to discover all the latest bikini, tights, and leggings designs and purchase them directly through your app!
• Earn points with every purchase and receive discount coupons.
Thanks to the Calzedonia Lover loyalty program, your status gets upgraded with each purchase or promotion. The more you shop, the more points you accumulate to earn discount coupons and save on your next order.

• Save with promotions and enjoy exclusive benefits.
If you activate instant notifications, you'll be the first to know about sales, discounts, promotions, and coupon discounts!
• Create your favorite combinations for a style that truly represents you.

From leggings and socks to swimwear, create your favorite looks. Mix and match bikini tops and bottoms as you like: your style is unique, and Calzedonia has everything you need to fully embrace it.
• Keep up to date with the latest from the Calzedonia brand.
If you wish, you will receive a notification when new products arrive. Don't miss out on the freshest trends of the moment!
• Shop and pay with complete peace of mind.
Our payment methods are quick and secure. You can even split your purchase into interest-free installments by choosing Klarna at checkout.
• Try it in store
We'll help you find the nearest store: so you can experience Calzedonia style firsthand and ask for advice.
• Receive notifications on the status of your orders.

Track your order in real time to know exactly when your new look will arrive at your doorstep.
With the Calzedonia app, you are truly you, at every moment: from summer swimwear to winter tights and leggings.
Step into your world; an array of shopping possibilities awaits!

Discover high-quality clothing for women, men and kids, and enjoy amazing styles, fashion trends and new collections.

Calling all trendsetters: if you're looking for new styles and want to find them as fast and easily as possible, check out the C&A app. From men's and women's fashions to baby wear, we offer everything your heart desires - and always at fair prices. Find out more by scanning clothing in store: simply download the app for many more benefits!

> Discover and fall in love with new styles!
The C&A app is very user-friendly and its various filters enable you to find the perfect fashion result in our online shop. We also feature basics for your daily outfits and the latest trends. You're sure to find something with our huge selection of men's, women's and kids' fashions! 

> A variety of clothing
Men's fashion: from basics to casual streetwear to classic men's fashion such as suits or ties, we have everything you need. 
Women's fashion: we have a huge selection of cool women's garments from sizes XS to XXL. From chic skirts and dresses to cool trousers and jeans, you won't miss a single women's fashion trend!
Kids' fashion and baby wear: clothing for the whole family. In children's fashion we feature everything from cute dresses to cosy pyjamas. Are you looking for baby clothes? We also have a big selection of great designs for every age and every size of baby.
Maternity wear: We also have something for your pregnancy. Maternity wear that is cute and cosy! Check it out.

> Product scan
The app helps you to shop in store, too.  
Is your favourite style not available in your size? No problem. Simply use the scanner to scan clothing barcodes or QR codes and directly access the product. Order on the app, and have your favourite women's, men's or kids' garment delivered to your home or a store of your choice.

> The perfect shopping experience
We offer you high-resolution photos and a zoom function, so you can experience our fashion up close and personal. Easily save your favourite garment and add it to your wish list. Are you looking for a present from men's fashion? Or would you like to buy the first baby outfit for a pregnant friend from our online shop? Save it and buy it later!

Secure payment. We offer various payment methods such credit card or PayPal. You can also create a customer account or easily order as a guest. Whether women's or men's fashion, you can buy clothes to suit your taste how and when you want.

> Social media
If you always want to stay up-to-date, follow us on our social media channels: 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ca/ 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ca/

Your opinion matters to us! 
If you have criticism, praise or suggestions you'd like to share, feel free to write us an email. We welcome all feedback as it enables us to constantly improve, so that we can offer you the perfect shopping experience for fashion and clothing. If you have any problems, directly contact us on: app@canda.com

Alles machbar – mit OBI: DEIN PROJEKT, DEINE APP. MIT PLANUNG, SHOP & RABATT.

Hey du, aufgepasst! Von der ersten kreativen Idee bis zur finalen Schraube: Die heyOBI App ist dein digitaler Begleiter für jedes Projekt rund um Haus, Wohnung und Garten. Hol dir Inspiration, shoppe bequem und buche Expertenhilfe genau dort, wo du sie brauchst. Und dank der integrierten heyOBI Kundenkarte sparst du bei jedem Projekt bares Geld!

Lade die App jetzt herunter und starte mit vielen Vorteilen! Alles machbar. Mit OBI.  

PLANUNG UND EXPERTEN-SERVICE BUCHEN 

Wir liefern dir das Know-how unserer Experten, damit du jede Herausforderung meisterst – völlig kostenlos. Planungstermine im Markt buchen: Reserviere ganz bequem deinen persönlichen Beratungstermin für Garten-, Bad- oder Küchenplanung direkt in deinem OBI Markt. Volle DIY-Kompetenz: Greife auf das Wissen des OBI Magazins zu – mit cleveren Tipps, inspirierenden Ideen und praxiserprobten Anleitungen für alle deine Projekte. 

ONLINESHOP & SMARTE ORGANISATION

Nie wieder lange suchen oder den Überblick verlieren. Wir machen deinen Einkauf, online wie im Markt, so effizient wie möglich. Online-Shopping: Bestelle deine Produkte bequem von unterwegs oder zu Hause mit der vollintegrierten Shop-Funktion. Oder reserviere deine Produkte direkt im Markt und hole sie später ab. 

Einkaufsliste & Markt-Navi: Erstelle deine persönliche Merkliste in der App und nutze das Markt-Navi, um Produkte in deinem OBI Markt schnell und ohne Umwege zu finden. Nie wieder Suchen!

Verfügbarkeits-Check: Prüfe, ob deine Wunschprodukte im Online-Shop oder in deinem ausgewählten OBI Markt vorrätig sind.  Produkt-Scanner: Scanne Artikel im Markt und erhalte sofort alle Infos und Details, die du für deine Kaufentscheidung brauchst. 

MAXIMAL SPAREN & EXKLUSIVE VORTEILE SICHERN

Die digitale heyOBI Kundenkarte ist immer dabei und garantiert dir die besten Preise. 1% Sofortrabatt: Spare bares Geld bei jedem Einkauf – online und in teilnehmenden OBI Märkten. Exklusive heyOBI Preise: Profitiere von dauerhaft reduzierten Preisen auf viele beliebte Produkte, die nur für heyOBI Nutzer gelten. Digitale Kassenbons: Alle Einkäufe können digital gespeichert – Schluss mit Zettelsuche! Ideal für Garantie und einfaches Nachkaufen.

Persönliche Coupons: Erhalte individuelle und attraktive Coupons, die sich wirklich für dich lohnen.

DEINE heyOBI APP: DAS ERSTE WERKZEUG FÜR JEDES PROJEKT.

Lade die App herunter und melde dich an! 

(Unsere Nutzungsbedingungen findest du unter www.app.obi.de/nutzungsbedingungen-app.html.)
